alert.note: Alert for Latimer; Le Flore; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 1:26PM CDT until April 20 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Pushmataha County in southeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Latimer County in southeastern Oklahoma... West central Le Flore County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 125 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Yanush to near Stanley, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Clayton... Talihina... Albion... Clayton Lake State Park... Talimena State Park... Stanley... Bengal... Nashoba... Kiamichi... Tuskahoma... Yanush... Sardis... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
